item.title: (Linux) Convert pem to ppk
item.description: Convert PEM to PPK & PPK to PEM If you’re using AWS EC2, you may need to convert PPK to PEM (or vice versa) when trying to SSH from different operating systems. Below are instructions on how to perform these conversions using the puttygen tool. Convert PPK to PEM Install puttygen: On Linux: You can install putty-tools using your package manager. For example, on Debian-based systems, run: sudo apt-get install putty-tools On Windows: Download and install PuTTY from the official website.
